entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
